Introducing â›©ï¸ GaaS - Gating as a Service
Gate your dapp using ANY on-chain data and txns.

3. Integrate your gate via SDK
4. No need to rely on simple token gating ğŸ« 
Want to try it? Comment below ğŸ‘‡ğŸ» https://t.co/eATuu1oXUZ
